page.title: 06Playground Games
page.content: We have games like{hopscotch}and {circle tig}marked out in paint on the tarmac.We also have a{climbing frame and two{hanging ropes}to swing on. There is a large,grassy{playing field beyond the tarmac with a{mound}at one side to run up and an avenue of{trees. In winter the field is often too muddy to use and the playground is swept by a howling wind. We play{football}and{netball}in winter and{rounders}and{cricket}in summer.As the seasons come round we also play{marbles, conkers, skipping and{ball.}The boys play with their{toy {cars}all the time. Here is a skipping rhyme:(T.B.=Teddy Bear):T.B.T.B.turn around: T.B.T.B. touch the ground: T.B.T.B.climb the stairs:T.B.T.B.say your prayers:T.B. T.B.turn out the light:T.B.T.B. say goodnight. We skip as we sing this.
